title: "GlobalFoundries, Bosch to develop radar chips for self-driving car features"
excerpt: "Chipmaker GlobalFoundries said on Tuesday it has partnered with automotive supplier Bosch to develop radar chips for self-driving features. Under the deal, Santa Clara, California-based GlobalFoundries said it will make high-frequency radar chips for Bosch at the chipmaker's Fab 1 facility in Dresden,"
